title: Predicting League of Legends Match Outcomes
description: Logistic regression and gradient boosting on pro match data; early-game features; fairness audit; >95% accuracy; slight blue-side bias.

title: Sports Betting Behavior Analysis
description: Explored odds fluctuations vs. betting patterns (EPL, NFL) with regression, A/B tests, hypothesis testing.

title: Medical Bill Decoder App
description: Swift + NLP app translating medical bills and estimating costs with breakdown visualizations.

title: Women’s Basketball Data Dashboard
description: Built an interactive dashboard in Python and Plotly for UCSD Women’s Basketball, tracking player performance and lineup efficiency.

title: Padres Business Analytics Case Study
description: Analyzed attendance trends, concession sales, and ticket pricing for San Diego Padres to recommend data-driven pricing strategies.

title: Climate Change Storytelling Visualization
description: Designed an animated scrollytelling visualization on CO₂ emissions using D3.js and narrative text alignment inspired by climate spirals.

title: Eclipse Sports Analytics Club Website
description: Developed the club’s official website featuring team projects, meeting schedules, and embedded Tableau dashboards.

title: Netflix Recommendation System
description: Implemented collaborative filtering and content-based models to predict movie ratings using the MovieLens dataset.

title: Stock Trend Prediction Model
description: Created an LSTM neural network to predict short-term stock movements; visualized uncertainty with confidence bands.

title: Food Rescue Route Optimization
description: Partnered with HDSI Food Recovery Network; optimized driver routes using NetworkX and Google Maps API.

title: Economic Indicators Dashboard
description: Built a Tableau dashboard combining GDP, inflation, and unemployment data; implemented dynamic filters for real-time insights.

title: Habesha Cultural Heritage Website
description: Developed a bilingual website to preserve Habesha cultural traditions through community stories and visual archives.
